data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Beirut, Lebanon.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Beirut, Lebanon
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Beirut, Lebanon.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Beirut, Lebanon.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 22,521 believers in the state of Beirut.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 3,167,900 citizens of Beirut, Lebanon, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Kurd, Kurmanji people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, train the church of Beirut, Lebanon to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 633 new simple churches in the state of Beirut, Lebanon. Place a simple church in every community of the 3,167,900 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Beirut. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

location.name: Beirut
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Lebanese, Arab, Palestinian, Romani, Domari, Arab, Egyptian, Arab, Syrian
